job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtdata scientistltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility you will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtlocation ltstronggtnorthampnbspaustin office if youd like to use itltpgtltpgtltstronggtsalaryltstronggt k kltpgtltpgtltstronggtvisa statusltstronggt us citizenltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtanalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtdesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtcollaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtgenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtms in quantitative field statistics mathematics computer science engineering etcltligtltligtat least years of experience as a data scientistltligtltligtdeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsltligtltligtfluency in pythonltligtltligtfamiliarity with big data frameworks and visualization tools cassandra hadoop spark tableaultligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtfor further details please submit a resumeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtaustin fraser inc is acting as an employment business in relation to this advert as a professional company we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminologyltpgt
